Package com.example.sphinxevents

Class ProfilePictureHelper

java.lang.Object
com.example.sphinxevents.ProfilePictureHelper
public class ProfilePictureHelper extends Object
A utility class for managing profile pictures, including generating default profile pictures, saving and retrieving Bitmaps, and uploading them to Firebase Storage.

  • Method Details

    • generateAndUploadDefaultProfilePicture

      public static void generateAndUploadDefaultProfilePicture(android.content.Context context, Entrant user, DatabaseManager.UploadProfilePictureCallback callback)
      Generates a deterministic default profile picture for the user and uploads it to Firebase Storage.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context.
      user - The current user for whom the profile picture is being generated.
      callback - The callback for success or failure of the upload.

    • generateDefaultProfilePicture

      public static android.graphics.drawable.Drawable generateDefaultProfilePicture(android.content.Context context, Entrant user)
      Generates a default deterministic profile picture based on the user's first name character.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context.
      user - The current user for whom the profile picture is being generated.
      Returns:
      The generated drawable profile picture.

    • drawableToBitmap

      public static android.graphics.Bitmap drawableToBitmap(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable drawable, int width, int height)
      Converts a Drawable object to a Bitmap.
      Parameters:
      drawable - The Drawable to convert.
      width - The width of the resulting Bitmap.
      height - The height of the resulting Bitmap.
      Returns:
      The converted Bitmap.

    • saveBitmapToFile

      public static android.net.Uri saveBitmapToFile(android.content.Context context, android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap, String fileName) throws IOException
      Saves a Bitmap to a file and returns the URI of the saved file.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context.
      bitmap - The bitmap to save.
      fileName - The name of the file to save the bitmap as.
      Returns:
      The URI pointing to the saved file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while saving the file.

    • saveBitmapToTempFile

      public static android.net.Uri saveBitmapToTempFile(android.content.Context context, android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
      Saves a Bitmap to a temporary file in the app's cache directory.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context.
      bitmap - The Bitmap to save.
      Returns:
      The URI of the saved temporary file, or null if an error occurs.

    • getBitmapFromUri

      public static android.graphics.Bitmap getBitmapFromUri(android.net.Uri uri)
      Retrieves a Bitmap from a file URI.
      Parameters:
      uri - The URI pointing to the image file.
      Returns:
      The decoded Bitmap, or null if the file cannot be found or read.
